General.Name: Namchow Food Group (Shanghai) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Namchow Food Group (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. operates in bakery food industry. It offers baking application oils and fats, whipped cream, imported dairy products, and frozen dough and fillings. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, China. Namchow Food Group (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Namchow (Cayman Islands) Holding Corp.

3.Name: Zhoujing  Chen
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
